an8.22:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā vajjīsu viharati hatthigāme.
an8.22:1.3: “aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ uggaṃ gahapatiṃ hatthigāmakaṃ dhārethā”ti.
an8.22:1.5: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
an8.22:2.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena uggassa gahapatino hatthigāmakassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
an8.22:2.2: Atha kho uggo gahapati hatthigāmako yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho uggaṃ gahapatiṃ hatthigāmakaṃ so bhikkhu etadavoca:
an8.22:2.3: “aṭṭhahi kho tvaṃ, gahapati, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato.
an8.22:2.4: Katame te, gahapati, aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, yehi tvaṃ samannāgato bhagavatā byākato”ti?
an8.22:3.2: ‘katamehi aṭṭhahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato’ti.
an8.22:3.3: Api ca, bhante, ye me aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā saṃvijjanti,
an8.22:3.4: taṃ suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
an8.22:3.5: “Evaṃ, gahapatī”ti kho so bhikkhu uggassa gahapatino hatthigāmakassa paccassosi.
an8.22:3.7: “yadāhaṃ, bhante, nāgavane paricaranto bhagavantaṃ paṭhamaṃ dūratova addasaṃ;
an8.22:3.8: saha dassaneneva me, bhante, bhagavato cittaṃ pasīdi, surāmado ca pahīyi.
an8.22:3.9: Ayaṃ kho me, bhante, paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṃvijjati. (1)
an8.22:4.1: So kho ahaṃ, bhante, pasannacitto bhagavantaṃ payirupāsiṃ.
an8.22:4.2: Tassa me bhagavā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi, seyyathidaṃ—
an8.22:4.4: kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṅkilesaṃ, nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi.
an8.22:4.5: Yadā maṃ bhagavā aññāsi kallacittaṃ muducittaṃ vinīvaraṇacittaṃ udaggacittaṃ pasannacittaṃ, atha yā buddhānaṃ sāmukkaṃsikā dhammadesanā taṃ pakāsesi—
an8.22:4.7: Seyyathāpi nāma suddhaṃ vatthaṃ apagatakāḷakaṃ sammadeva rajanaṃ paṭiggaṇheyya;
an8.22:4.8: evamevaṃ kho me tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi:
an8.22:4.10: So kho ahaṃ, bhante, diṭṭhadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogāḷhadhammo tiṇṇavicikiccho vigatakathaṅkatho vesārajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusāsane tattheva buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca saraṇaṃ agamāsiṃ, brahmacariyapañcamāni ca sikkhāpadāni samādiyiṃ.
an8.22:4.11: Ayaṃ kho me, bhante, dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṃvijjati. (2)
an8.22:5.1: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, catasso komāriyo pajāpatiyo ahesuṃ.
an8.22:5.2: Atha khvāhaṃ, bhante, yena tā pajāpatiyo tenupasaṅkamiṃ; upasaṅkamitvā tā pajāpatiyo etadavacaṃ:
an8.22:5.4: Yā icchati sā idheva bhoge ca bhuñjatu puññāni ca karotu, sakāni vā ñātikulāni gacchatu.
an8.22:5.5: Hoti vā pana purisādhippāyo, kassa vo dammī’ti?
an8.22:5.6: Evaṃ vutte, sā, bhante, jeṭṭhā pajāpati maṃ etadavoca:
an8.22:5.8: Atha kho ahaṃ, bhante, taṃ purisaṃ pakkosāpetvā vāmena hatthena pajāpatiṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena bhiṅgāraṃ gahetvā tassa purisassa oṇojesiṃ.
an8.22:5.9: Komāriṃ kho panāhaṃ, bhante, dāraṃ pariccajanto nābhijānāmi cittassa aññathattaṃ.
an8.22:5.10: Ayaṃ kho me, bhante, tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṃvijjati. (3)
an8.22:6.1: Saṃvijjanti kho pana me, bhante, kule bhogā.
an8.22:6.2: Te ca kho appaṭivibhattā sīlavantehi kalyāṇadhammehi.
an8.22:6.3: Ayaṃ kho me, bhante, catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṃvijjati. (4)
an8.22:7.1: Yaṃ kho panāhaṃ, bhante, bhikkhuṃ payirupāsāmi;
an8.22:7.3: So ce me āyasmā dhammaṃ deseti;
an8.22:7.5: No ce me so āyasmā dhammaṃ deseti, ahamassa dhammaṃ desemi.
an8.22:7.6: Ayaṃ kho me, bhante, pañcamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṃvijjati. (5)
an8.22:8.1: Anacchariyaṃ kho pana, bhante, saṃghe nimantite devatā upasaṅkamitvā ārocenti:
an8.22:8.2: ‘asuko, gahapati, bhikkhu ubhatobhāgavimutto asuko paññāvimutto asuko kāyasakkhī asuko diṭṭhippatto asuko saddhāvimutto asuko dhammānusārī asuko saddhānusārī asuko sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo asuko dussīlo pāpadhammo’ti.
an8.22:8.3: Saṃghaṃ kho panāhaṃ, bhante, parivisanto nābhijānāmi evaṃ cittaṃ uppādento:
an8.22:8.4: ‘imassa vā thokaṃ demi imassa vā bahukan’ti.
an8.22:8.6: Ayaṃ kho me, bhante, chaṭṭho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṃvijjati. (6)
an8.22:9.1: Anacchariyaṃ kho pana maṃ, bhante, devatā upasaṅkamitvā ārocenti:
an8.22:9.3: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhante, tā devatā evaṃ vademi:
an8.22:9.4: ‘vadeyyātha vā evaṃ kho tumhe devatā no vā vadeyyātha, atha kho svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo’ti.
an8.22:9.5: Na kho panāhaṃ, bhante, abhijānāmi tatonidānaṃ cittassa unnatiṃ:
an8.22:9.6: ‘maṃ tā devatā upasaṅkamanti, ahaṃ vā devatāhi saddhiṃ sallapāmī’ti.
an8.22:9.7: Ayaṃ kho me, bhante, sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṃvijjati. (7)
an8.22:10.1: Sace kho panāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato paṭhamataraṃ kālaṃ kareyyaṃ, anacchariyaṃ kho panetaṃ yaṃ maṃ bhagavā evaṃ byākareyya:
an8.22:10.2: ‘natthi taṃ saṃyojanaṃ yena saṃyutto uggo gahapati hatthigāmako puna imaṃ lokaṃ āgaccheyyā’ti.
an8.22:10.3: Ayaṃ kho me, bhante, aṭṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saṃvijjati. (8)
an8.22:11.1: Ime kho me, bhante, aṭṭha acchariyā abbhutā dhammā saṃvijjanti.
an8.22:11.3: ‘katamehi cāhaṃ aṭṭhahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato bhagavatā byākato’”ti.
an8.22:12.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu uggassa gahapatino hatthigāmakassa nivesane piṇḍapātaṃ gahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
an8.22:12.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an8.22:12.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu yāvatako ahosi uggena gahapatinā hatthigāmakena saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo, taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi.
an8.22:13.2: Yathā taṃ uggo gahapati hatthigāmako sammā byākaramāno byākareyya, imeheva kho, bhikkhu, aṭṭhahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgato uggo gahapati hatthigāmako mayā byākato.
an8.22:13.3: Imehi ca pana, bhikkhu, aṭṭhahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ uggaṃ gahapatiṃ hatthigāmakaṃ dhārehī”ti.
